summary: Contoso Wireless offers a comprehensive streaming product that allows customers to access a wide variety of content, including movies, TV shows, music, sports, and more. The streaming product is compatible with any device with internet capabilities and includes advanced encryption technology for security. It also features special features such as playlists, bookmarking, and 4K Ultra HD resolution. Plans start at $9.99 per month or $99 per year and include unlimited streaming with no hidden fees or charges. Signing up is easy on the website and customer service is available to help with any questions or issues.
